<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iron Medallion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2981)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a Will save against a fear effect but haven't rolled yet

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small medallion is shaped like a shield. When you activate it, you gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering save and other saves against fear for 1 minute. On the triggering save, if the outcome of your roll is a failure, you get a success instead. If the outcome is a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Iron Medallion
